message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.CV, cs.NE 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) as it deals with building artificial agents with perspective taking abilities. It also involves the use of artificial neural networks and reinforcement learning, which are common techniques in the field of AI. 

The paper is also likely to belong to the sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning) as it involves the use of deep reinforcement learning to train the agents. 

The sub-category of cs.RO (Robotics) is also a possibility as the ability to take the perspective of another agent is important for robots to interact with humans and other robots in a social environment. 

The sub-category of cs.CV (Computer Vision) is also a possibility as the agents need to perceive and understand the objects in the environment to be able to take their perspective. 

Finally, the sub-category of cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is also a possibility as the paper involves the use of artificial neural networks to train the agents.
